title: Large top floor studio nestled back at separate 4 plex at rear of prop
posting_body: Please be advised that unauthorized Craigslist ads exist posing as The Lapham Company.

Large top floor studio nestled back at separate 4 plex at rear of property, $1,895.00
For an Appointment to View, please contact: Metkel mobile:
Cats Allowed (Extra deposit may be required), No Dogs
Top floor unit in located in separate 4 plex at rear of property
Large newly carpeted studio with tons of closet space.
Common front door, also private rear entrance
Laundry located in basement of building
Quiet due to off street location
Close to Cal Northgate Campus, Bongo Burger, Hummingbird Cafe, and other popular eateries and cafes
Approximately 1 Mile to Downtown Berkeley BART
Bus stops for AC Transit nearby
Office Hours are 9-5pm Closed for Lunch 12-1pm
